version_description:
Our players come off the bench after warming up and bring us a new update to offer you a great gaming experience! In this update you will find:

-We've fixed some minor in-game problems
-We've added special offers
-The cards Finn and Vuvucelas have been changed (the first one goes to the tutorial and the other to the Favela)

Our players come off the bench after warming up and bring us a new update to offer you a great gaming experience! In this update you will find:

-We've fixed some minor in-game problems
-We've added special offers
-The cards Finn and Vuvucelas have been changed (the first one goes to the tutorial and the other to the Favela)

Our players come off the bench after warming up and bring us a new update to offer you a great gaming experience! In this update you will find:

-We've fixed some minor in-game problems
-We've added special offers
-The cards Finn and Vuvucelas have been changed (the first one goes to the tutorial and the other to the Favela)

Our players come off the bench after warming up and bring us a new update to offer you a great gaming experience! In this update you will find:

-We've shortened the tutorial
-We have reduced the world ranking to 50 people. The player position no longer appears.
-Modifications in the offers system
-Fixed the bug to play with your facebook friends
-Other problems have been solved

Our players come off the bench after warming up and bring us a new update to offer you a great gaming experience! In this update you will find:

-We've shortened the tutorial
-We have reduced the world ranking to 50 people. The player position no longer appears.
-Modifications in the offers system
-Fixed the bug to play with your facebook friends
-Other problems have been solved

Our players come off the bench after warming up and bring us a new update to offer you a great gaming experience! In this update you will find:

-We've shortened the tutorial
-We have reduced the world ranking to 50 people. The player position no longer appears.
-Modifications in the offers system
-Fixed the bug to play with your facebook friends
-Other problems have been solved

NEW UPDATE

- We have added the competition leagues! They are unlocked when you reach level 3. The top 10 get a reward!

- We have added a new system of seasons that are unlocked from 3,500 trophies and last 15 days. At the end of the season you will receive a reward!

- We have added a new stadium! the Legendary and the Egyptian, together with new characters

- We have added the training mode so you can try your cards

- We have solved some and problems

NEW UPDATE

- We have added the competition leagues! They are unlocked when you reach level 3. The top 10 get a reward!

- We have added a new system of seasons that are unlocked from 3,500 trophies and last 15 days. At the end of the season you will receive a reward!

- We have added a new stadium! the Legendary and the Egyptian, together with new characters

- We have added the training mode so you can try your cards

- We have solved some and problems

Thank you for playing Soccer Royale! We have made a lot of changes in this update:

-New physics for the ball.
-No time in matches: You have to score two goals to win!
-New energy bar: After 10 turns, you obtain more energy.
-Now you can create your own club!
-New informative texts to help you understanding gameplay better.
-Now you can silence ingame chat.
-New Community panel.

We hope you enjoy the game!

We have made important connectivity improvements:
- Now, the server does not disconnect you if you leave the game during a game.
- If your opponent stops playing, their turns will last half of the time and you can continue playing to win the game quickly.
- Stability Improvements.
- Matchmaking improvements

Bugs fixed:
- Now, you can see the remaining time of the season
- Fixed some crashes

¡2 New LEGENDARY characters!

- ANUBIS “The Guardian”: He turns your basic players into “Servers of Anubis”, increasing their stats. Available from Stadium 6 (Tahat)
- EUGENIA “La Catrina”: She reduces the stamina of all opponent’s players to zero. Available from Stadium 5 (Tequila)

Based on community's feedback:
- A “Cancel” button has been added to the matchmaking
- Now, you can check players profiles from the rankings or from friends list
- A “Clubs Ranking” has been added

Balance Update:

- Now, Vuvuzela’s effect only lasts one turn
- The stats of a character can only be reduced by a 30%. The Vuvuzela + multiple Nancys combo is now way less powerful, making the gameplay experience funnier.
- Chip, Maki and Rashid are now Legendary cards.

Bug Fixing:

- Fixed the bug related to cards requests/donations in the club chat
- Fixed the bug causing cards to disappear when using emojis at the beginning of the match
- Fixed Joaquin’s shooting
- Fixed Dunkan’s ability
- Fixed Vitki’s ability
